title: Sortify
description: Built Sortify,an interactive sorting visualizer with customizable controls for algorithm type, speed, range.

title: CodeEditor
description: This project is designed to provide a Code Editor where users can write and test code in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Item Manager
description: A full-stack Item Manager app using React,Express,Mongoose,with modals and email support via Nodemailer.

title: CRUD Next.js
description: A responsive CRUD app allowing users to add, edit, and delete items with dynamic routing and clean UI.

title: Pokemon Finder
description: Built a Pokémon Finder using Axios to fetch and display data from the PokéAPI.

title: Softshell
description: A fast and responsive React app powered by Vite and Tailwind CSS, with icon support via Lucide and React Icons.

title: Game
description: This project is a Rock-Paper-Scissors game that I developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring sound effects.
